detail_desc: Short dress in a crêpe weave with narrow notch lapels and a wrapover front with ties inside. Long sleeves with decorative, covered buttons at the cuffs and a detachable fabric belt at the waist with a covered metal buckle. Lined.

Short, wide dress in an airy weave with a V-shaped opening at the top and narrow ties at the neckline. 3/4-length raglan puff sleeves with elastication at the cuffs and a seam at the waist and on the skirt. Unlined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Dress in soft ribbed jersey with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Small stand-up collar, sleeves with a frill with overlocked edges, a seam at the waist and bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a print motif, a jersey-lined, wrapover hood with appliqués and embroidery, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Chinos in washed stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly, side pockets, a coin pocket, fake back pockets and slim legs.
Shirt in airy cotton with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.

Dungarees in washed stretch denim with embroidery on the front. Adjustable straps with press-studs, press-studs at the sides and a fake fly. Chest pocket, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Concealed press-studs at the crotch in size 4-12M.
Sleeveless all-in-one pyjamas in soft organic cotton jersey with short legs and press-studs at the crotch.
Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Jeans in washed, superstretch denim with a high waist, fly with visible buttons, fake front pockets, real back pockets and super-skinny legs.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and skinny legs.
Socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with a small motif at the top and elasticated tops.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Yoke with a pleat at the back and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Straight-cut dress in a soft weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey. Round neckline with a narrow ribbed trim.

Handbag in imitation leather with suede details, a handle at the top and a flap with a decorative metal buckle and concealed metal fastening. Detachable, adjustable shoulder strap with metal carabiner hooks, and three inner compartments, the central one with a zip. Lined. Size approx. 10x22x30 cm.
Trousers in ribbed jersey. High waist with concealed elastication, and flared legs.

Knitted jacket with a soft thermal fleece lining, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Small appliqué on one sleeve, side pockets and a contrasting colour jersey trim around the pockets, cuffs and hem. The jacket is made partly from recycled polyester.
Jumper in a pattern knit containing some wool with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal rings in various designs.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with an extra-high waist and slim legs. The jeans are made partly from recycled cotton.
Jumper in soft, textured-knit cotton with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Calf-length kaftan in a crêpe weave with short, wide puff sleeves and a smocked seam under the bust. Jersey lining made from recycled polyester.
Fitted jacket in washed, stretch denim with buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button, and side pockets.
Warm-lined boots in glossy imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel approx. 2 cm.
Alice band with appliqués on the top.

Dress in a soft jacquard knit with a rounded collar and bow at the waist in woven fabric. Small opening with a button at the back of the neck, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs, a gathered seam at the waist, and a flared skirt.
Two-strand metal necklace with one flat, herringbone-patterned chain and one narrow, longer chain decorated with small metal balls and a pendant.
Knee-high boots in imitation leather with square toes and high heels. Satin linings made from recycled polyester, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9 cm.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed viscose jersey with narrow shoulder straps and a low-cut back.
Short jumper in a loose knit containing some wool with long, gently flared sleeves.
Plastic bucket with a handle at the top.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from organic cotton with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Suede court shoes with pointed toes, open sides and a strap across the foot. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heels 8 cm.
Round bag in braided paper straw with two handles at the top. Lined. Size 10x43x43 cm.
Leggings in heavy, organic cotton jersey with glittery details and a soft brushed inside. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Jumper in a soft jacquard knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and a rib-knit flounce at the hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey.
Shaftless socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend. The cotton content of the socks is organic. The polyester content of the socks is recycled.

Set with a top and pair of trousers in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem and a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y). Trousers with an elasticated, drawstring waist and ribbed hems. Lightly brushed inside.
Playsuit in a viscose weave with a V-neck at the back and  narrow shoulder straps that tie at the back. Concealed zip in one side, seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Unlined.
Short coat in soft pile with notch lapels, concealed press-studs down the front and side pockets. Lined.
Socks in soft rib knit.
NICK VEASEY x H&M. Long-sleeved top in printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the top is organic.

Soft, non-wired bra in microfibre with a lightly padded front and shaped cups with ventilating mesh pockets for breast forms. Adjustable shoulder straps, padded for comfort and a wide fastening at the back with seven different positions for best fit.
Short, fitted dress in jersey with a cut-out section at the back and long sleeves. Unlined.
Set with a long-sleeved dress and pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on trousers in soft, washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets and elasticated hems.

Shirt in a cotton and cupro weave with a turn-down collar and classic front in a straight style with a gently tapered waist. Open chest pocket, a yoke at the back, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. The cupro content of the shirt is recycled.
Clamdiggers in washed cotton with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and front and back pockets.
Warm-lined Chelsea boots in imitation leather with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Soft faux fur linings and insoles and chunky soles.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Calf-length satin skirt with narrow elastication at the waist, a slit in one side and embroidery at the hem. Unlined.
Brazilian briefs in soft cotton jersey with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap front pockets with a press-stud, a zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Thong body in lace with adjustable shoulder straps and a non-wired push-up bra with padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs.

STUDIO COLLECTION. Trenchcoat in sturdy cotton with contrasting colour seams. Collar and shoulder tabs with metal press-studs, partly concealed buttons down the front and flare to the hem. Flap patch front pockets with a concealed press-stud and a soft, detachable belt with a metal buckle. Unlined.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Short dress in airy, patterned chiffon with a frill-trimmed opening at the back and button at the back of the neck. Concealed zip in one side, long sleeves with smocking at the cuffs, a seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem. Double-layered bodice at the front and short jersey lining skirt.
Pull-on shorts in soft, stretch denim with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Treggings in sturdy jersey with elastication and a press-stud at the waist and fake front pockets with zips.
Long cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the opening, cuffs and hem.

Ankle-length trousers woven in a soft viscose blend with a high, paper bag waist and detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, side pockets, flap leg pockets with a pleat, and tapered legs.
V-neck top in soft slub jersey with short sleeves, a seam centre back and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Jacket in washed cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and welt side pockets. Buttoned cuffs and an adjustable tab at the sides of the hem.

Calf-length, boat-neck dress in softly draping silk with darts at the waist creating a gently tailored fit. Concealed zip at the back with a hook-and-eye fastener at the back of the neck. Long, slightly wider sleeves with shaping seams at the elbows. Seams at the waist and in the skirt. Lining in a soft, tone-on-tone viscose weave.
Seersucker dress in a narrow cut at the top with a gentle flare to the hem. Elasticated top, narrow shoulder straps and a rounded hem.

Short dress in sturdy jersey with a round neck, short, flounced sleeves, a seam at the waist and tie belt that wraps over at the back. Gently flared skirt with concealed pockets in the side seams and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Short cotton twill skirt with a zip fly and button, front and back pockets and visible seams front and back.
Imitation suede slippers with soft pile linings and fluted soles.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with a lined gusset.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Tops in soft slub cotton jersey with concealed press-studs on one shoulder and short puff sleeves with a scalloped trim. Scalloped trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem.
Cycling shorts in stretch cotton jersey with a high, elasticated waist.
Sturdy clutch bag in snakeskin-patterned imitation leather with a metal snap lock at the top and narrow, detachable metal chain shoulder strap. Lined. Size 5x9x18 cm,.
Push-up bra in lace and mesh with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a narrow hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Cotton slippers with elastication around the opening, terry linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles.
Short-sleeved top in a modal and cotton blend with gathers on one shoulder and a draped front with a tie at the hem.
